Ever since I was 14 I have always wanted a Pug. I think they are cute with all of the wrinkles that they have. They are a nice lap dog that will be a great companion. My girlfriend was planning on getting me one for my birthday but wanted to tell me so that I could pick it out. My girlfriend and I were looking at the different pups that were available on-line. We found one with really good champion bloodlines and quickly put down a deposit. I have yet to come up with a name for the pup, it is a female so suggestions are welcome.What you see is a picture of the pup which the breeder calls "Jade". She is about 4 months old now and how cute she is. We decided that if we were going to get a pug that we might as well get a good quality one that we could potentially show or breed in the future. This pup is gorgeous and I would have no issues with showing it. As you can see from the picture we are getting the pup from Trinity Kennel, so far it has been a great transaction and I will update all of you with how great it was once it is completed.
